level.text: The Director shall charge fees for business license categories with a Housing: Residential endorsement as follows:
With 26 or more units: $208, plus $130 for each additional 25 units or fraction thereof;
Each license in this section shall be charged a per unit Rental Accommodations Division fee, pursuant to D.C. Official Code ยง 42-3504.01.

Source: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 4654 (May 28, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 8792 (September 24, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12191, 12195 (December 24, 2010).
